text: Colon Cemetery is the national cemetery of Cuba. It is in the center of Havana. Building of the cemetery started in 1871. It opened in 1886 with a chapel in the center of the cemetery. the cemetery also has memorials and monuments. == Other websites == * Panoramic photo of Colon Cemetery Category:Havana Category:National cemeteries Category:Buildings and structures in Cuba Category:1876 establishments Category:Military monuments and memorials Category:19th-century establishments in Cuba Category:1870s establishments in North America
title: Colon Cemetery
